snippet.title: MicroProse™ Soccer Trailer
snippet.description:
Tackle world class soccer

Go football crazy, football mad. MicroProse™ Soccer puts your footwork skills to the test as you compete against pros in the World Cup, International Challenge, or in the indoor league.

Pick-up-and-play: the game's intuitive controls and overhead perspective of the pitch make it easy to get into the action.
You can challenge the computer or challenge a friend in local multiplayer.
Choose from 29 different teams.
Players can perform a variety of movements, including overhead and banana kicks.
The game's replay system lets you relive the moment of glory after you score a goal.

Easy to play, but difficult to master, this simulation will keep you on the pitch day after day.

🐥 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playziggurat
🤖 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zigguratinteractive
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zigguratinteractive/
📬 Email: https://www.ziggurat.games/signup

Like, comment, and subscribe!

#Retrogames #Nostalgia
